transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha ji sir, good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon.
Customer: Kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Executive: Kon aman ji bol rahe hai?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Wo bol raha tha apne ko ye IndiaMART ke package ke sath wo vyapar ne wo kuch tha na 6 mahine ke liye subscription free of.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Uska abhi message nahi mila hai whatsapp me kuch.
Executive: Theek hai.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha, ji bhaiya.
Executive: Ha wo bol raha hai sir uska subscription ka message nahi mila uska kya hai?
Executive: Ji, do minute line pe rahiye aap mai bata raha hu abhi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Do minute hold kar raha hu ha na sir, line pe rahiyega.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi.
(silence)
Executive: Nahi wo rate se to banao.
(silence)
Executive: Aalo banao do.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello, sir kya bola gaya tha aapko? Kya bola gaya tha vyapar ka aapko, vyapar ka kya bola tha?
Customer: Vyapar ya wo koi aur se konsa ek do do application me se koi ek istemal kar sakte hai na 6 mahine ke liye?
Executive: Nahi mujhe to aisa kuch bhi abhi jankari prapt nahi hui. Kya bola tha aapko batao aap?
Customer: Are 6 mahine ka subscription free of milega aisa bola gaya mere ko. Kis chiz ka sir, kis chiz ka aap batao?
Customer: Ek vyapar bola gaya tha aur ek dusra koi application dono me se koi ek chun sakte hai aisa bola gaya hai.
Executive: Accha chalo sir aap mujhe ek kam karo abhi ek ghante ka time do mai aapko call back karke bata raha hu.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi aap Rajkot hai na aapka office?
Executive: Ha ha 6:30 baje tak, 6 baje tak rehta hai, theek hai, 6 baje ke andar
Customer: Pehle bata dunga mai aapko.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi waha aap call karke baat kar lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
Customer: Ha ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received subscription message.

- Enquired about 6 months free subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for an hour to call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, free subscription, call back
